column4: What's the best way to install Eclipse?  The package manager only recognizes 3.5.  Download 3.6 from eclipse.org?
yeah it's the only way. but best to stick to the repository version IMO. you're welcome to download 3.6 and compile it too.
i do not know about eclipse 3.5 vs 3.6 but mostly it's recommended to stick to the version from the official repository,
